verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> shir A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor [or] Psalm לְאָסָֽף׃ <WH623> le-'a-Saf. of Asaph אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not דֳּמִי־ <WH1824> do-mi- Keep not thou silence לָ֑ךְ Lach; אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ <WH2790> te-che-Rash hold not thy peace וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט <WH8252> tish-Kot and be not still אֵֽל׃ <WH410> 'El. O God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ <WH341> oy-vei-cha For lo thine enemies יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <WH1993> ye-he-ma-Yun; make a tumult וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ <WH8130> u-me-san-'Ei-cha, and they that hate נָ֣שְׂאוּ <WH5375> Na-se-'u thee have lifted up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> Rosh. the head

עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- against עַ֭מְּךָ <WH5971> 'Am-me-cha against thy people יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ <WH6191> ya-'a-Ri-mu They have taken crafty ס֑וֹד <WH5475> Sod; counsel וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ <WH3289> ve-yit-ya-'a-Tzu, and consulted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6845> tze-fu-Nei-cha. against thy hidden ones

אָמְר֗וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru, They have said לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> Le-chu Come וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם <WH3582> ve-nach-chi-Dem and let us cut them off מִגּ֑וֹי <WH1471> mig-Goy; from [being] a nation וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no יִזָּכֵ֖ר <WH2142> yiz-za-Cher may be no more in remembrance שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> shem- that the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. more

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for נוֹעֲצ֣וּ <WH3289> no-'a-Tzu For they have consulted לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev with one consent יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> yach-Dav; together עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, Against בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit confederate יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ <WH3772> yich-Ro-tu. they are

אָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> 'o-ho-Lei The tabernacles אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> 'E-dom of Edom וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <WH3459> ve-yish-me-'e-Lim, and the Ishmaelites מוֹאָ֥ב <WH4124> mo-'Av of Moab וְהַגְרִֽים׃ <WH1905> ve-hag-Rim. and the Hagarenes

גְּבָ֣ל <WH1381> ge-Val Gebal וְ֭עַמּוֹן <WH5983> Ve-'am-mon and Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> va-'a-ma-Lek; and Amalek פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <WH6429> pe-Le-shet, the Philistines עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> Yo-she-vei with the inhabitants צֽוֹר׃ <WH6865> Tzor. of Tyre

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also אַ֭שּׁוּר <WH804> 'Ash-shur Assur נִלְוָ֣ה <WH3867> nil-Vah also is joined עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam; They הָ֤י֥וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu have זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> ze-Ro-a' with them they have holpen לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- the children ל֣וֹט <WH3876> Lot of Lot סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <WH6213> 'a-seh- Do לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> la-Hem with כְּמִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> ke-mid-Yan; unto them as [unto] the Midianites כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א <WH5516> ke-si-se-Ra as [to] Sisera כְ֝יָבִ֗ין <WH2985> che-ya-Vin, as [to] Jabin בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> be-Na-chal at the brook קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7028> ki-Shon. of Kison

נִשְׁמְד֥וּ <WH8045> nish-me-Du [Which] perished בְֽעֵין־ ve-'ein- דֹּ֑אר <WH5874> Dor; at Endor הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> Ha-yu became דֹּ֝֗מֶן <WH1828> Do-men, they became [as] dung לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> la-'a-da-Mah. for the earth

שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <WH7896> shi-Te-mov Make נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ <WH5081> ne-di-ve-mo their nobles כְּעֹרֵ֣ב <WH6159> ke-'o-Rev like Oreb וְכִזְאֵ֑ב <WH2062> ve-chiz-'Ev; and like Zeeb וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח <WH2078> u-che-Ze-vach as Zebah וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <WH6759> u-che-tzal-mun-Na', and as Zalmunna כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ <WH5257> ne-si-Che-mov. yea all their princes

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> 'A-me-ru Who said נִ֣ירֲשָׁה <WH3423> Ni-ra-shah in possession לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; אֵ֝֗ת <WH853> 'Et, נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> ne-'ot Let us take to ourselves the houses אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'elo-Hai, O my God שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <WH7896> shi-Te-mov make כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל <WH1534> chag-gal-Gal; them like a wheel כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ <WH7179> ke-Kash, as the stubble לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> lif-nei- before רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> Ru-ach. the wind

כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> ke-'Esh As the fire תִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> tiv-'ar- burneth יָ֑עַר <WH3293> Ya-'ar; a wood וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה <WH3852> u-che-le-ha-Vah, and as the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <WH3857> te-la-Het on fire הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> ha-Rim. the mountains

כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> ken So תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם <WH7291> tir-de-Fem So persecute בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ <WH5591> be-sa-'a-Re-cha; them with thy tempest וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ <WH5492> u-ve-su-fa-te-Cha with thy storm תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ <WH926> te-va-ha-Lem. and make them afraid

מַלֵּ֣א <WH4390> mal-Le Fill פְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> fe-nei-Hem their faces קָל֑וֹן <WH7036> ka-Lon; with shame וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> vi-vak-Shu that they may seek שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha thy name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Let them be confounded וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ <WH926> ve-yib-ba-ha-Lu and troubled עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- for ever עַ֗ד <WH5704> 'Ad, and let וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ <WH2659> ve-yach-pe-Ru yea let them be put to shame וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> ve-yo-Ve-du. and perish

וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> ve-ye-de-'U, That [men] may know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֬ה <WH859> 'at-Tah whose שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha that thou whose name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh alone [is] JEHOVAH לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <WH905> le-vad-De-cha; you alone עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, [art] the most high עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. over all the earth
